mapper.select: select * from board order by bno desc
mapper.insert: insert into board (bno, title, writer, content) values ((select NVL2(max(bno),max(bno)+1,1) from board), #{title}, #{writer}, #{content})
mapper.update: update board set readcnt = readcnt+1 where bno = #{bno}
update board set title=#{title}, writer=#{writer}, content=#{content}, updatedate=sysdate where bno=#{bno}
